name: RPG Attack Generator
description: Generates RPG attacks given a weapon
context:
[ Random Attack Generator ]
[ Given a player and an enemy, generates a player attack description and detects the damages done to the enemy, the new wounds if the attack was successful, and the enemy status after the attack. ]

list.enemy: [ Target: Orc; difficulty: hard; armor: Leather Armor; wounds: none; blood loss: none; status: healthy ]
list.description: You attack the orc using your bare hands. The orc manages to dodge or block some of your attacks, but still gets bruised and tired from the efforts.

list.enemy: [ Target: Orc; difficulty: medium; armor: Leather Armor; wounds: none; blood loss: none; status: healthy ]
list.description: You attack the orc using your fists. It's not very effective, but you manage to break the orc's nose.

list.enemy: [ Target: Orc; difficulty: medium; armor: Leather Armor; wounds: broken nose; blood loss: minor; status: slightly wounded ]
list.description: You strike the orc in the stomach with your iron sword. You cut into orc's abdomen and some guts come out, spreading his blood everywhere

list.enemy: [ Target: Orc; difficulty: medium; armor: Leather Armor; wounds: broken nose, broken ribs, eviscerated; blood loss: major; status: heavily wounded ]
list.description: You punch the semi-conscious orc in the torso. Your blows doesn't do much, but the orc is already so badly mangled that it succumbs to his severe wounds and dies.

list.enemy: [ Target: Orc; difficulty: medium; armor: Leather Armor; wounds: broken nose, broken ribs; blood loss: minimal; status: heavily wounded ]
list.description: You swing your iron longsword at the orc's throat. Due to his wounds, he fails to dodge and you cut his head off.

list.enemy: [ Target: Goblin; difficulty: easy; armor: Cloth Armor; wounds: none; blood loss: none; status: healthy ]
list.description: You attack the goblin using your bare fists. The goblin is quite aa agile fighter, and dodges most of your attacks.

list.enemy: [ Target: Goblin; difficulty: easy; armor: Cloth Armor; wounds: none; blood loss: none; status: healthy ]
list.description: You slash the goblin with your knife across the chest. The goblin's cloth armor does nothing for protection, it slowly starts to bleed from the cut.

list.enemy: [ Target: Goblin; difficulty: easy; armor: Cloth Armor; wounds: slashed chest; blood loss: moderate; status: moderately wounded ]
list.description: You pierce the goblin with your wooden spear. Your speer flies into the goblin's stomach and guts, spreading his blood and intestines everywhere.

list.player: [ Rare Large Steel Axe; Leather Armor ]
list.enemy: [ Target: Kobold; difficulty: easy; wounds: none; blood loss: none; status: healthy ]
list.description: You swing your steel axe at the boar with strength, severing its right leg

list.player: [ Rare Small Copper Dagger; Leather Armor ]
list.enemy: [ Target: Kobold; difficulty: easy; wounds: none; blood loss: none; status: healthy ]
list.description: You swiftly attack the kobold with your copper dagger, cutting his left ear right off

list.enemy: [ Target: Kobold; difficulty: easy; wounds: lacerations (right arm), severed limb (left arm); blood loss: major; status: heavily wounded ]
list.description: You stab the enemy in the chest, pushing the blade deep through the kobold's hearth. The kobold is badly wounded and doesn't even fight back.

list.enemy: [ Target: Troll; difficulty: very hard; wounds: disemboweled, amputated (right leg); blood loss: major; status: heavily wounded ]
list.description: You strike the troll with your wooden club, only doing light bruises on its sternum. The troll is however badly in shape and bleeding profusely, and just crumbles to the floor few seconds later, dead.

attackPlayer.context: [ Attack Description: given a target and a player's equipment, generates an attack description ]

list.player: [ Rare Small Copper Dagger; Leather Armor ]
list.enemy: [ Target: John; race/species: human; wounds: none; blood loss: none; status: healthy ]
list.description: You swiftly attack John with your copper dagger, cutting his left ear right off

list.enemy: [ Target: Emma; race/species: human; wounds: lacerations (right arm), severed limb (left arm); blood loss: major; status: heavily wounded ]
list.description: You stab Emma in the chest, pushing the blade deep through her hearth. Emma is badly wounded and doesn't even fight back, she falls on the floor, dead.

list.enemy: [ Target: Robert; race/species: human; wounds: disemboweled, amputated (right leg); blood loss: major; status: heavily wounded ]
list.description: You strike Robert with your wooden club, only doing light bruises on his sternum. Robert is however badly in shape and bleeding profusely, and just crumbles to the floor few seconds later, dead.

heal.context: [ Heal Description: given a target and a player's equipment, generates a heal description ]

list.enemy: [ Target: Kate; race/species: human; wounds: bruised arm (right); blood loss: minimal; status: slightly wounded ]
list.description: You cast a minor healing spell on Kate, and her arm is completely healed!

list.enemy: [ Target: John; race/species: human; wounds: amputated (right leg), amputated (left arm); blood loss: heavy; status: severely wounded ]
list.description: You cast a major healing spell on John, and his arm and leg regrow instantly. He's now completely healed!

list.enemy: [ Target: Robert; race/species: human; wounds: heavy bruises, eviscerated, amputated (left arm), perforated heart; blood loss: major; status: dying ]
list.description: You use your light healing spell on Robert, which heals some of his injuries. He's still badly injured.

healDetection.context: [ Heals Detection: Given a player heal action description, detects the new heals if the heal was successful. ]

list.description: You attack the orc using your bare hands. The orc manages to dodge or block some of your attacks, but still gets bruised and tired from the efforts.
You attack the orc using your fists. It's not very effective, but you manage to break the orc's nose.
You strike the orc in the stomach with your iron sword. You cut into orc's abdomen and some guts come out, spreading his blood everywhere
You punch the semi-conscious orc in the torso. Your blows doesn't do much, but the orc is already so badly mangled that it succumbs to his severe wounds and dies.
You swing your iron longsword at the orc's throat. Due to his wounds, he fails to dodge and you cut his head off.
You attack the goblin using your bare fists. The goblin is quite aa agile fighter, and dodges most of your attacks.
You slash the goblin with your knife across the chest. The goblin's cloth armor does nothing for protection, it slowly starts to bleed from the cut.
You pierce the goblin with your wooden spear. Your speer flies into the goblin's stomach and guts, spreading his blood and intestines everywhere.
You swing your steel axe at the boar with strength, severing its right leg
You swiftly attack the kobold with your copper dagger, cutting his left ear right off
You stab the enemy in the chest, pushing the blade deep through the kobold's hearth. The kobold is badly wounded and doesn't even fight back.

You strike the troll with your wooden club, only doing light bruises on its sternum. The troll is however badly in shape and bleeding profusely, and just crumbles to the floor few seconds later, dead.

deathDetection.context: [ Death Detection: given a status, detects whether or not the target is dead. ]
